job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
OverviewSoftware engineer shall support a distributed system providing various Platform-as-a-Service (PaaS) features to a diverse customer set. The PaaS system shall support several applications as standalone instances or configured with several supporting components.&nbsp;   QualificationsMaster's degree in Computer Science or related discipline from an accredited college or university, plus five (5) years of experience as a SWE, in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexity.ORBachelor's degree in Computer Science or related discipline from an accredited college or university, plus seven (7) years of experience as a SWE, in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexityORNine (9) years of experience as a SWE, in programs and contracts of similar scope, type, and complexity.ANDU.S. CitizenshipANDTS SCI w/FS Poly   Task Required Skills  - Experience using the Unix command line   
  - Experience writing scripts using Bash   
  - Basic understanding of Source Control Systems, specifically Git   
  - Experience with CI/CD principles and methodologies   
  - Familiarity with Ruby and the Rails Framework   
  - Familiarity with Javascript, specifically Node.js   
  - General SQL database knowledge, preferably Postgres   
  - Experience with GitLab CI/CD and pipelines   
   Task Desired Skills  - Experience with containerization technologies such as Docker   
  - Experience with container orchestration technologies such as Kubernetes, OpenShift and Helm   
  - Experience with in-memory data structure stores such as Redis   
  - Demonstrated domain knowledge in distributed systems (cloud-based technologies)   
  - Demonstrated understanding of the core software development lifecycle
